_sText:
de_peacemaker - Bomb/Defuse
Map made by: Xanthi (xanthi_mapdesign@hotmail.com)
textures Valve
Models : Valve

background :
After the big disaster in de_industrial_compound the goverment said to the media.
They stopped the production of uranium and other nuclear material.
But afcourse it was one big lie.
Some weeks ago a satelite spotted a island with higly nuclear activity.
The Allies where so mad about this that they leaked the information to a terrorist leader.
You know terrorists, they like to blow up stuff, specially a island with nuclear material.


Counter-Terrorists: You've received
a tip about activities at the Island
That's the reason why you guys are hidden
at the Island, to stop the terrorists.
Defend it at all cost.


Terrorists:
Blow up the whole island to whipe it out forever
option 1: place a bomb at the trainstation with tank wagons
option 2: place a bomb at in the nuclear warehouse
It doesnt matter what target you choose the buildings are connected with a pipeline that transporting
nuclear toxic.
So there is always one big boom.

Other Notes: There are 2 possible ways
to cause a chemical disaster.
